articles.description: Coronation Street youngster Summer Spellman has her three father figures struggling to support her decision to be a surrogate for Esther and Mike Hargrave.
articles.content:

articles.author: Metro
articles.title: My daughter taught herself to read aged 2 - Daily Mail
articles.description: British mother Tanya Paxton tells Metro.co.uk she was alarmed when her two-year-old daughter Sienna started reading street signs - until doctors explained the rare reason why.
articles.content:
When Tanya Paxton's baby girl started speaking at the age of two, the mum was ecstatic.
Sienna was just over 2lbs when she was born two-and-a-half months premature and had been hitting her milestone… [+7610 chars]
